Partials of songs I am writing.

Melodies of you.

Like a broken mirror, you shatter my dreams
Like a scratched DVD, you replay the scenes.
LIke an old record, you sing the same songs.
and I cant help but hear girl, those melodies of you.
Always playin in my mind.
The melodies of you, playin all the time.
Such a sweet sweet song, make a grown man cry.
Such a beautiful voice, make an angel die.

Beautiful Nightmare.

Cause You are the girl in my, Beautiful nightmare
The horrors they fade away, when you are right there.
and girl your the light that brightens up my night.
and Helps me through my, Beautiful nightmare.

When I am dreaming, Your by my side
when all else goes wrong, you help turn the tide.
(thats where I'm stuck)

(untitled)

I see your face when I'm sleepin.
Hear your voice when I'm awake.
I see your eyes when I'm dreamin.
and my heart begins to ache.

I know its not much,
but I give you my love.
Girl your just the one for me.
An angel from above.

I cannot live without you,
and I'll tell you why.
If I couldnt have you.
I'd surely die.

You are all that I want girl
you are all that I need.
(something something something)
I beg and I plead.

Can I let you in on a little secret.

I am going to be one day famous....maybe rich too, but I doubt it.......I am Daryl, known to some as Jesus, (please take no offence to me being called Jesus...I cant stop them) though I also answer to Caveman, Sasquatch, Darly(9th grade english teacher.) Tall man from some people. Ogre, hey you. just about whatever you want to call me....I would have a picture on here but I dont happen to have a camera......

I happen to have a unique personality. I am a genious, both book smart and common sense, though I dull down my common sense for humors sake. For some reason everyone likes me. Even if you dont like me at first...somehow I work my way under your skin(In a good way) I do strange things just to get people to look at me.......usualy they are funny, like I have the ability to put one leg behind my head, and hop up and down on the other leg. at the same time. . . .

Please, help spread the word.....I have arived, Join my group of friends today

I'm also told that I have an amazing voice...singing that is..I like rock and roll by the way.... .

Hello

Hello everyone, come visit my profile, you will get to read my beliefs. Wow, I am so not as charasmatic online as I am in real life.

I was thinking

I was recently thinking about several things, one of which is time, Some people say that time is a circle, others a figure eight. I on the other hand, see time as a dot. The main basis for my theory is that When something happens in time. It changes everything, all at once. Something that is happening twenty years from now, Is happening right now, in another time. Most of you out there wont understand this, but some of you will.

I also figured out something nifty, Should a person actually build a time machine, They would only be able to travel back or forwards by a count of years, (There would be no specific date setting, only today however many years ago.) The reason for this is that, should a person travel backwards through time, they are not traveling through space as well, So a person would come out in the exact same location in the universe as they were when they left their own time. The Earth however, will not be in the same spot. You might end up in space, or stuck in a mountain, or something equally unpleasant.

Something Cool about 3.
Did you know that any three consecutive numbers, when strung together to make one number, the resulting number is divisable by three. Also, If you start at the number two, and count by three's the average of the three numbers you counted is divisable by three.

Another thing I thought about recently is Underwater/Space construction. Would it be possable to build an underwater facility? Imagine, a large field just fifteen feet below the surface of the ocean, Plants could be grown there, they would not take up any "Land" and they would get sunlight. Should a ship need to pass over that part of the ocean, the underwater field could be lowered into the sea to allow for it.
You could also theoreticly do the same thing in space, with plants getting full time sun,

Have you ever thought about the robot suits you see in some movies? or like Gundam Wing? Here's my thought on those. Should the US military decide, they could hire toy companies to build these things....I mean, I've seen some of those toys they've got. Pre-tt-y fancy.

Check them out.

Go to your start button, click on run. Type Telnet. then when it opens type

Open nilgiri.mythril.com 8888.
Open Lots.wolfpaw.net 3000

They are MUD's. A MUD is a Multi User Dungeon, They are free online RPG's However, the game is text based and will take a while to get used to.

Basic commands are
Direction (As on a compass. N S E W NW NE SW SE) the command will send your character one room in the direction you typed.

Say. to say something in the same room you are in.
kill. To attack something.
Get, To pick something up
Drop, To drop something.
look, to see the room you are in.

Try them out I like them.

All Hallows Eve

I went out last night, I wore black pants, and a black shirt. Now most capes that you buy just hang behind you, but I got a black cape/sheet, and just safety pinned it to myself, lol It billowed out behind me. My eyeliner was kinda creepy too but, lol everyone said it was great although I realy didnt dress up, I didnt however make any attempts to get candy.

.....

Beautiful Goddes,
Haunt my dreams,
Whisper your love,
my everything,
my nothing.
without you,
alone.
but together
a fire, burning
bright, hope love,
end of the night,
of eternal darkness,
where now there is light.
Lady of Moon
Sun, stars, and planets
Last breath, undying oath
to you I give,
my love
and
soul.

A short message.

Being away from you is not so bad, it's the leaving you again after fate just brought us together again

Never Say Goodbye.

The Pain of being away from you
is nothing compared to
The crushing agony of parting ways
When Fate has just brought us together again.
But you know
that time will show
us together again
Because we Never say Goodbye
and the love just wont die
Girl I know this to be true
the same fate for me and you
we'll grow old hand in hand
till at last we leave this land
Together Forever
I love you.

Dont freak out....It's not the best, I just needed to express my feelings.

We're a dieing breed.

To every guy that's said, "Sex CAN wait"
To every guy that's said, "You're beautiful."
To every guy that was never too busy to drive across town
(or across the state) to see her.
To every guy that gives flowers and a card when she is sick.
To every guy who has given her flowers just because.
To every guy that said he would die for her.
To every guy that really would.
To every guy that did what she wanted to do.
To every guy that cried in front of her.
To every guy that she cried in front of.
To every guy that holds hands with her.
To every guy that kisses her with meaning.
To every guy that hugs her when she's sad.
To every guy that hugs her for no reason at all.
To every guy who would give their jacket up for her.
To every guy that calls to make sure she got home safe.
To every guy that would sit and wait for her for hours
just to see her for ten minutes.
To every guy that would give his seat up.
To every guy that just wants to cuddle.
To every guy that reassured her that she was beautiful
no matter what.
To every guy who told his secrets to her.
To every guy that tried to show how much he cared
through every word and every breath.
To every guy that thought maybe this could be the one.
To every guy that believed in her dreams.
To every guy that would have done anything
so she could achieve them.
To every guy that never laughed at her
when she told him her dreams.
To every guy that walked her to her car.
To every guy that gave his heart.
To every guy who prays that she is happy
even if you are not with her.

...This one bulletin is for you...

Not many girls appreciate nice guys anymore...
And because of this, there are not many left out there...

i guarantee 90% of the men on pan.netwill not repost this cuz they care more about their image

If you are a nice guy repost this with "We're a Dying Breed "

If you are a girl that thinks every guy should treat a girl this way
repost this with: "To Every Guy..."

Girl

Girl I love you
Girl I need you
Girl your everything to me.

Girl I Dream you
Girl I Miss you
Girl Your the one for me

Girl I wish you
Girl I Hear you
Girl your everywhere to me

Girl I want you
Girl I seek you
Girl your Beautiful to me

Girl I live you
Girl I see you
Girl your all that matters to me

Girl I Believe you
Girl I Trust you
Girl your love means everything
To me.

Sigh

I do not have the words
though loudly I do call.
The Pain, the Sound, the Tears
freezing as they fall.
A time of troubles, a time of torment
a time of love, my soul be spent.
A lasting thing, it never dies
See you the love within my eyes.
It Burns, It's cold
the truth, my love, be told
for you
The truth, my love, be sold
to you
The truth, my love, will hold
by you

Wow It's amazing how much one can hurt when love is an emotion of good and happiness.

Again.

Amazement and wonder

Amazement and wonder
beyond my control
a life well lived,
is well worth my soul.

I'll sell it to you,
and you know the price
your love, my love
will surely suffice.

Amazement and wonder
live life thats true
well kept is my soul
with the love of you

again Sigh.

I feel the waves crashing over me
I cast my gaze but I cant see
where are you girl, my love, my light.
Soothe my fears, hold me tight
Love everlasting has no end
this prayer of love to you I send
seek me out, find me here
I hope my love will draw you near
That I may look upon your face
and take in all that is your grace
your wonderous beauty oh so divine
How I'm glad that you are mine
forget me not, nor I you
and hold my love, forever true.

Stars and stone

If my love for thee were stars, the night sky would be a sight to see
were it made of stone, a mountain it would surely be.
But were it ever broken
a thousand lifetimes would I cry, as needles of white hot torment pierced
my flesh, torn asunder by the crashing waves of misery, burried under a
dark sea of despair. Drifting on the silently howling winds of lonelieness.
A fog of sadness withering my soul.
But I would tell you now, that no matter what happens.
My love would still have no end, like grains of sand in the desert, drops of water
in an ocean, or leaves blowing on the winds in a forest.
If my love for thee were stars, the night sky would be a sight to see.
were it made of stone, a mountain it would surely be.

From a guy's point of view

From a GUY'S point of view

We don't care if you talk to other guys.

We don't care if you're friends with other guys.

But when you're sitting next to us, and some random guy walks into the room and you jump up and tackle him, without even introducing us, yeah, it pisses us off.

It doesn't help if you sit there and talk to him for ten minutes without even acknowledging the fact that we're still there.

We don't care if a guy calls you, but at 2 in the morning we do get a little concerned. Nothing is that important at 2 a.m. that it can't wait till the morning.
__________________________
___________________

_______
Also, when we tell you you're pretty/ beautiful/ gorgeous/ cute/ stunning, we freaking mean it.

Don't tell us we're wrong.

We'll stop trying to convince you.

The sexiest thing about a girl is confidence.
__________________________
___________________

_______
Yeah, you can quote me.

Push us down on the couch and make a move once in a while. We like that aggressiveness about you and we like the unexpected. When we know you're really happy, it makes us happy too.

You always want us to show you our affection, but it works both ways. Don't wait for us to grab your hand or put our arms around you (although we should do this anyway), make the first move every once in a while, that way we know you care about us as much as we care about you.
__________________________
___________________

_______
Don't be mad when we hold the door open.
Take Advantage of the mood im in.

LET US PAY FOR YOU!

DON'T "FEEL BAD"

We enjoy doing it (Paying for you).

It's expected.

Smile and say "thank you."
__________________________
___________________

_______
Kiss us when no one's watching.

If you kiss us when you know nobody's looking we'll be more impressed.
__________________________
___________________

_______
You don't have to get dressed up for us.

If we're going out with you in the first place, you don't have to feel the need to wear the shortest skirt you have or put on every kind of makeup you own.

We like you for WHO you are and not WHAT you are.

honestly, i think a girl looks more beautiful when she's just in her pj's. or my tshirt and boxers, not all dolled up

__________________________
___________________

_______
Don't take everything we say seriously.

Sarcasm is a beautiful thing. See the beauty in it.

Don't get angry easily.
__________________________
___________________

_______
Stop using magazines/media as your bible.

***Don't talk about how hott Morris Chesnutt, Brad Pitt, or Taye Diggs is in front of us.

***It's boring, and we don't care.
You have girlfriends for that.
__________________________
___________________

_______
Whatever happened to the word "handsome"/"beautiful"

I'd be utterly stunned by a girl who greeted me with "Hey
handsome!" instead of "Hey baby/ stud/ cutie/ sexy" or whatever else you can think of.

on the other hand im not saying I wouldn't like it either ; )
__________________________
___________________

_______
Girls, I cannot stress this enough:
IF YOU AREN'T BEING TREATED RIGHT BY A GUY, DON'T WAIT FOR HIM TO CHANGE. DITCH HIS SORRY, DISGRACE-TO-THE-MALE-POPUL
ATION SELF, AND FIND SOMEONE WHO WILL TREAT YOU WITH UTTER RESPECT

Someone who will honor your morals.

Someone who will make you smile when you're at your lowest.

Someone who will care for you even when you make mistakes.

ENJOY A GOOD MAN...THEY ARE HARD TO COME BY IN A DAY AND AGE AS WE LIVE IN WHERE PEOPLE DON'T GIVE A SHIT....LONESTAR

Someone who will love you, no matter how bad you make them feel.

Someone who will stop what theyre doing just to look you in the
eyes....and say "i love you" ...

....AND ACTUALLY MEAN IT!

Give the nice guys a chance!!!!!!

**************************
*******************

Guys repost this if you agree

Girls repost this if you think it's cute

Every Guy who isn't a jerk will agree with this, so we hope that all the girls that read this will repost......

*thank you for reading....

Wow

Wow...You gave me your conditioner, now my hair smells like yours.....how distracting.

On Pain

Pain is a sensation that everyone must feel, at one point in time or another.
Pain is something that comes and goes like the ebbs of the tide of time, Pulsing and fading as rapidly as does the dawn.

Like a fresh show fallen, it melts away, only to be replaced by an even harder freeze. Like a coating of ice upon the heart, or upon the mind, it suffocates, while numbing from the cold. So pain is there, but you must remember, it always fades away, to be replaced by the cold light of day, Or the warmth of a summer breeze

ummm.

an infinite pursuit
over an endless ground
listening to silence
the silence of sound

across the sunrise
through mud and rain
a path that is narrow
but living again

A river's crossing
reflects sun on high
midday is coming
it's here with a sigh

as dusk now aproaches
and the silence returns
a great plain of glass
land of plenty, tree and fern

Tis dark in the hollows
where white bones lie
where once there was water
now is bone dry

again dawn returneth
neverending as tide
a circle of living
a circle of life.

You

When I think of the future, that long road called life. I see myself totaly surrounded by people, but utter alone. I dont want to move on from what I know, into a giant world, where I am so small. Like a ship on the endless ocean, I need something to anchor me, and that anchor is you, reminding me of who I am. Like a sail you drive me, like a compass, guide, and I need you. Because without you, I'm lost, alone and hopeless.

Purple butterflies in a happy joyous place (rly bout death)

A death of the body,
is a death of the mind
a death of the soul
is a death of mine
a death in the day
is a death in the light
while a death in shade
is a death in the night.
The death of a friend
the death of a foe
all deaths the same
if its someone we know
some say that death
is the end of a life
and that death can be cold
at the end of a knife
but a death thats accepted
is a death that is warm
not a death where the soul
from the body's been torn.
